Contact | Counseling and Therapy in Westchester | The Counseling Center Skip to content (914) 793-3388 Contact DONATE Home Our Staff Events About Services Individual Psychotherapy Child and Family Therapy Marriage and Couples Psychotherapy Telehealth Therapy College Experience Life Transitions Group Psychotherapy Locations Eastchester Tuckahoe Bronx Pelham New Rochelle Yonkers Mount Vernon Subsidy Program and Insurance Blog Resources Home Our Staff Events About Services Individual Psychotherapy Child and Family Therapy Marriage and Couples Psychotherapy Telehealth Therapy College Experience Life Transitions Group Psychotherapy Locations Eastchester Tuckahoe Bronx Pelham New Rochelle Yonkers Mount Vernon Subsidy Program and Insurance Blog Resources Get in touch Take the first step toward your new life CALL NOW: (914) 793-3388 CONTACT US Reach out We are here for you Select a day from the calendar below to schedule a complimentary consultation with our Clinical Director, Dr. Jennifer Klein. She will listen to hear what’s on your mind and if appropriate, set you up with a therapist from our center who best fits your needs. You can also connect our office at (914) 793-3388 or via email . Alternatively, you may fill out the form below and we will contact you. Name * Phone number * Email address * Message 0 / 180 I allow this website to store my submission so they can respond to my inquiry. Submit About Services Subsidy Program and Insurance Blog Resources Schedule Appointment Contact About Services Subsidy Program and Insurance Blog Resources Schedule Appointment Contact About Services Subsidy Program and Insurance Blog Resources Schedule Appointment Contact About Services Subsidy Program and Insurance Blog Resources Schedule Appointment Contact 180 Pondfield Road Bronxville, NY 10708 US [email protected] (914) 793-3388 Facebook-f Map-marker-alt The Counseling Center is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. All donations are tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law. Site Credits Meet Our 2025 Gala Honoree Lia Gravier In 2022, I organized a panel for the Counseling Center about mental health featuring CNN correspondent SE Cupp.  SE is a friend of mine, and despite being a public figure, chose to be transparent in sharing her mental health struggles during COVID. SE served as a catalyst to create a panel to talk honestly and openly about real issues like hers, and Lia was suggested as a potential panellist who could offer a good perspective.  When contacted, Lia suggested we showcase her daughter Olivia instead, who proved to be spectacular in her honesty and humour around her ADHD and anxiety. You can see what I mean here . As a mother and local citizen, Lia’s sense of self and ability to get things done is impressive.  I’m betting I don’t need to tell you this!  She has played a pivotal role in creating the BOLD Council at the Bronxville School and has also been part of the Bronxville  PTA and DEI Committees.  We appreciate Lia’s work building community, fostering inclusion and offering a range of support to students and families over the years.

Memberships - Westchester Country Club Home Golf Course Details Rates Lessons Dining The W Steakhouse The W Grill Room W Food Truck Memberships Driving Range Event Hosting Event Info Weddings Contact Contact Us Job Opportunities Select Page Memberships Memberships at Westchester Country Club 2025-2026 Membership Programs – Enrollment begins on September 1, 2025 Experience the best of golf and amenities at Westchester Country Club with our all-inclusive membership packages. All memberships include taxes, greens fees, golf carts, range balls, a free GHIN membership, and a 10% discount at our Pro Shop and restaurant. Restrictions Apply: Couples must reside in the same household. 2025-2026 Annual Membership Single: $9,300 Couple: $14,800 2025-2026 6-Month Membership Single: $7,400 Couple: $12,500 2025-2026 4-Month Membership (subject to availability) Single: $4,800 Couple: $7,500 Additional Amenities Customize your membership with these optional add-ons: Large Locker: $150 Small Locker: $100 Bag Storage: $130 Handicap Fee: $55 Why Join Westchester Country Club? Unlimited access to our 27-hole Karl Litten-designed course. Access to exclusive dining experiences and events. Discounts at the Pro Shop and restaurant. Comprehensive amenities for a seamless golfing experience. How to Join For inquiries or to enroll in one of our membership programs, please call the Golf Shop at  Call Us For Info Business Hours Golf: 7:00 am -5:00pm Daily W Steakhouse: 4:00 pm to 9:00pm W Grill Room: Closed Monday, Tues-Sun 10:30 am to 6:00 pm daily. Course Details - Westchester Country Club Home Golf Course Details Rates Lessons Dining The W Steakhouse The W Grill Room W Food Truck Memberships Driving Range Event Hosting Event Info Weddings Contact Contact Us Job Opportunities Select Page Course Details Our Club More than three decades later, Westchester Country Club is still, quite simply, one of a kind. Inspired by Karl Litten it is one of the top public golf courses in South Florida. We feature 27 holes spread out on three 9-hole courses. Westchester Country Club provides a serene setting that includes beautiful tropical vegetation along with a wide array of wildlife amongst the lushest greens. Located in the heart of Boynton Beach, Westchester Country Club offers a golfing experience like no other! The Layout Our 27 – Holes of Karl Litten designed Championship Golf Course offers seven different sets of tees allowing players of all skill sets the opportunity to be challenged and enjoy a tropical golf setting. Westchester offers three unique nine hole courses that will test your creativity off the tee and accuracy on the approach, it is your classic “risk and reward” design that will challenge you from start to finish. From our lush fairways to our manicured greens, Westchester Country Club is a true South Florida golfing experience. Course Photos Palm Beach Florida Weather Average Temperature in Palm Beach FL Palm Beach County’s moderate climate allows for year round outdoor activities such as golfing, tennis, hiking or exploring the county’s many parks and its 47 miles of Atlantic coastline and white sand beaches. Palm Beach County Florida Average Annual Air Temperature: 75 F average annual air temperature 83 F average annual high temperature 67 F average annual low temperature Course Layouts Red Course A forgiving course with wide fairways and minimal hazards, perfect for beginners or a relaxing round. Strategically placed bunkers add an element of challenge for more experienced players. Gold Course The most technical of the three layouts, featuring tighter fairways, water hazards, and a focus on precision. Ideal for golfers looking to test their skills. Blue Course A balanced layout that offers a mix of open fairways and challenging approaches. Known for its scenic beauty, the Blue Course provides a memorable experience for all. Driving Range Visit our Year-round driving range with grass hitting areas! Range balls available for purchase via credit card.  Learn More The Designer Karl Litten Renowned Golf Course Architect is a world renowned golf course architect and designed all 27-holes here at Westchester Country Club. Mr. Litton continues to turn out spectacular golf courses worldwide. Perhaps best known for his work in The Middle East, Karl has recently teamed up again with Jeffrey Myers, to form Litten Myers Golf Course Architects. The two met more than 28-years ago when Karl originally hired Jeffrey. Karl Litton has developed quiet a reputation in the industry for blending great golf courses with successful land planning and Westchester is a perfect example. Business Hours Golf: 7:00 am -5:00pm Daily W Steakhouse: 4:00 pm to 9:00pm W Grill Room: Closed Monday, Tues-Sun 10:30 am to 6:00 pm daily. Westchester Country Club - Experience our beautifully maintained course, perfect for golfers of all skill levels. Home Golf Course Details Rates Lessons Dining The W Steakhouse The W Grill Room W Food Truck Memberships Driving Range Event Hosting Event Info Weddings Contact Contact Us Job Opportunities Select Page Welcome to Westchester Country Club Public Welcome!  Book A Tee Time Golf Experience our beautifully maintained course, perfect for golfers of all skill levels. Our Championship designed golf course will provide the right challenge for you. Memberships Join our community and enjoy exceptional benefits, including greens fees, golf carts, range balls, a free GHIN membership, & exclusive discounts. Dining “The W” steakhouse offers Glatt Kosher cuisine with premium cuts, while “The W Grill Room” provides a relaxed atmosphere with a variety of dishes. For quick bites, visit our “W Food Truck” for convenient and delicious options. Welcome to Westchester Country Club Nestled in the heart of Boynton Beach, Florida, Westchester Country Club has been a South Florida gem for over 30 years. Designed by renowned architect Karl Litten, it stands as one of the region’s premier public golf courses. Our 27 holes are spread across three unique 9-hole courses, offering golfers a versatile and memorable experience. Surrounded by lush greens, Westchester is a serene oasis, featuring vibrant tropical vegetation and diverse wildlife. The tranquil setting provides the perfect backdrop for a round of golf. Whether you’re a seasoned player or a beginner, Westchester promises an unforgettable golfing experience.  About Us Plan Your Event With Us  Learn More The banquet facility at Westchester Country Club is one of Boynton Beach’s best-kept secrets. With a recently remodeled main dining room and elegant banquet spaces that accommodate up to 350 guests, our venue offers a fresh yet refined atmosphere that is sure to impress. We specialize in hosting: Weddings Bar/Bat Mitzvah Celebrations Corporate Meetings and Events Birthday Parties Anniversaries Retirement Parties Golf Outings And virtually any event you can imagine! Celebrating a special occasion with loved ones is one of life’s greatest joys, and you don’t need to be a member to take advantage of our exceptional facilities. From entertainment and décor to dietary needs, specialty lighting, and audio-visual setups, we handle every detail with care. Our experienced team ensures your event is seamless and unforgettable. Our cuisine rivals the finest country clubs in the area, and our customer service is second to none. For your next event, let us provide the perfect venue. Contact our team of professionals today to guide you through the planning process. Rates - Westchester Country Club Home Golf Course Details Rates Lessons Dining The W Steakhouse The W Grill Room W Food Truck Memberships Driving Range Event Hosting Event Info Weddings Contact Contact Us Job Opportunities Select Page Rates Public Golf Rates Book online for the best rates!  Book Now Important Information ALL RATES INCLUDE TAX Carts must be returned 15 minutes before sunset. Rates are subject to change. All tee times must be booked in advance: 5 days in advance over the phone. 7 days in advance online. Prepaid tee times are non-refundable and cannot be modified. Rainchecks will not be offered for prepaid tee times. Group Bookings (12+ Players) Planning an outing with 12 or more players? Group bookings must be made by calling the Golf Shop directly. One payment is required for the entire group (cash or credit). Raincheck Policy At Westchester Country Club, we prioritize safety and player satisfaction during inclement weather. Here are the guidelines for our raincheck policy: Eligibility: Rainchecks are available only if excessive inclement weather occurs. Rainchecks are pro-rated based on the number of holes played. The monetary value credit will be issued in the form of a raincheck for use on your next round. Limitations: Rounds beginning after 3 PM are not eligible for rainchecks in the event of inclement weather. Whether you’re warming up for a round Or looking to sharpen your skills Westchester Country Club’s driving range is the perfect place to refine your game. Contact Us or visit us today to elevate your practice sessions!  Contact Us Business Hours Golf: 7:00 am -5:00pm Daily W Steakhouse: 4:00 pm to 9:00pm W Grill Room: Closed Monday, Tues-Sun 10:30 am to 6:00 pm daily.
